_sText:
-==LEVEL INFO==-
CS_ *Hostage Rescue Map*
Up to 40 players supported.
Gets same FPS as office at worst.
Expansive underground and large overground with many choke points/ ambush spots.
Four hostages to rescue.
Industrial/Bunker theme.
Dawn/Daylight level.
No custom textures Used

-==Map Issues==-
The included .nav file works, but displays 'Nav. mesh built with different version of map' message at the start of each round.

-==Changes==-
Total rebuild of level, adding new rooms, completely new enviroments, proper optimisation, different balancing and theming.
No issues with displacements anymore.
Utilisation of new valve releases to add extra depth and charachter to the level.
Easter eggs :D
Removal or many CPU heavy elements, such as the unnessecary water and ragdolls


-==NOTES==-
Made by: IK_MadMetal
	 IK_Matrix


Build time: 8 Months on and off
Compile time: Circa 20mins
Contact us: johnstrange1@hotmail.com

Thanks out to our failthful testers: Dead Pixel, Erazer, WalrusWarrior all the rest of you ;) you know who you are
Shout out to Valve and Snarkpit, invaluable game/tutorials.
Further thanks to our old clans: 1337 and Gk13.
